questions.quote: Yeah, hold on. I'm, uh, I'm just trying to get a reading on my dashboard compass. Where are my parents?
Oh, man, it's spinach! I've been walking around like this all afternoon.
Every summer you guys went to camp together. I was jealous. Felt like he was the summer me.
Oh, you're tall - she's tall I'm tall. What's the difference who's tall. We're all tall.
...Over the balcony, bounced off some respirator thing *into* the patient!
Oh no. That's impossible. I'd rather lie to him for the rest of my life that go through that again. He was crying. Tears. Accompanied by mucus.
Well, we think it would be a nice touch for the Foundation literature. Do you have a favorite poet, George?
Hey, I know what we can do. I've got a friend who works over at the police station. He's a composite artist.
'Cause I'm an idiot! You may think you're an idiot, but with all due respect, I'm a much bigger idiot than you are.
I gotta tell ya, I have a bad association with the name Alex.
